attributedTo.name: Las Vegas PolRev Chapter
attributedTo.summary:
Welcome to the Las Vegas Political Revolution Chapter!

Organizing in the Las Vegas Nevada area, we are a branch of Political Revolution dedicated to driving change. On this events map you’ll find upcoming events, protests, and meetings in the Las Vegas area.

We are currently focusing on organizing, however, we have other goals for this group that include;

  • Volunteering in the community.

  • Promoting grassroots protests and activism.

  • Contacting our representatives with concerns about current events.

  • And finding other ways people like you can get involved.

We are looking for motivated individuals who are passionate about human rights, protecting the environment, strengthening the economy, promoting universal healthcare, and want to take part in making the world a better place.

Whether you’re interested in organizing, spreading the word, designing flyers, informing the news or meeting with our representatives, there’s room for you!

Contact us here for more information or email us at lasvegas@pol-rev.com to find out how you can get involved!

organizerActor.name: Missouri Jobs with Justice
organizerActor.summary:
Missouri Jobs with Justice’s (JwJ) mission is to organize Missourians to build transformative power for social, racial, and economic justice in our state. JwJ believes that strong relationships rooted in justice, equity and solidarity are necessary for building transformative power for social, racial, and economic justice. Their vision is of a Missouri where: the economy and public infrastructure are strong and good jobs are plentiful; the right of all workers to organize and collectively bargain is protected; opportunity exists for all regardless of race, identity, or immigration status; All are assured economic security and a safe, healthy life from the cradle to the grave; and the barriers in American society that exist to prevent our vision are understood, challenged, and dismantled.

With offices in St. Louis, Springfield and Kansas City, Jobs with Justice is part of national Jobs with Justice and People’s Action networks, and will participate in nationally coordinated activities and support like-minded local coalitions in other parts of the country when called to do so.

attributedTo.name: Las Vegas PolRev Chapter
attributedTo.summary:
Welcome to the Las Vegas Political Revolution Chapter!

Organizing in the Las Vegas Nevada area, we are a branch of Political Revolution dedicated to driving change. On this events map you’ll find upcoming events, protests, and meetings in the Las Vegas area.

We are currently focusing on organizing, however, we have other goals for this group that include;

  • Volunteering in the community.

  • Promoting grassroots protests and activism.

  • Contacting our representatives with concerns about current events.

  • And finding other ways people like you can get involved.

We are looking for motivated individuals who are passionate about human rights, protecting the environment, strengthening the economy, promoting universal healthcare, and want to take part in making the world a better place.

Whether you’re interested in organizing, spreading the word, designing flyers, informing the news or meeting with our representatives, there’s room for you!

Contact us here for more information or email us at lasvegas@pol-rev.com to find out how you can get involved!
